attributes.action: Help Save Phoenix Day Centre From Closure
attributes.additional_details:
Hillingdon Council are planning to close Phoenix Day Centre in South Ruislip.

Phoenix is a day centre for severely disabled adults in the borough.

We believe this centre should remain open and be expanded in to the adjacent Bourne Court facility to make the 70 place centre that the council have planned for the isolated Queen’s Walk site.

We urge the Government to intervene and urge the London Borough of Hillingdon to reconsider this ill-advised plan.

If you agree please sign our petition.

Thank you!!
